Title: Haasil
Writer: Tigmanshu Dhulia (dialogue), Tigmanshu Dhulia (script), Tigmanshu Dhulia (story)
Actors: Jimmy Shergill, Hrishitaa Bhatt, Irrfan Khan, Ashutosh Rana
Plot: Aniruddh, a law-abiding college student, in love with Niharika, gets caught up in college politics and crime and must fight it out for himself when his friend becomes his foe.
